title: Fear casts shadow over Burundi referendum
text:
Fear casts shadow over Burundi referendum 3:39pm BST - 01:42
Burundi is voting in a referendum that would allow the president, Pierre Nkurunziza, to add another two terms to the three he has served already. His opponents say they've been harassed and threatened, and there are fears of ethnic conflict and further repression. Lucy Fielder reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Burundi is voting in a referendum that would allow the president, Pierre Nkurunziza, to add another two terms to the three he has served already. His opponents say they've been harassed and threatened, and there are fears of ethnic conflict and further repression. Lucy Fielder reports.
